content.content: I was wondering do we have any flowchart that explains the relations on the entire gitcoin ecosystem, sections, its products and sub-products. It seems a lot has changed over time. New terminologies, topics, and workflows were introduced.  Which topics are underneath the governing section or several entities/features of DAO etc.? Is anyone actively maintaining the big picture?

Hi @ekram-syed did you have a chance to read the following post? (lots of history and product info there)     TLDR - What is Gitcoin?  🤖 DAO Governance and Vision       Post Updated May 2022.  Other onboarding resources:   Lore book GitcoinDAO Primer    Hi frens,  I’m writing an overview post about Gitcoin, so that prospective DAO participants know the why/what/how of GitcoinDAO.   I plan to update this post every month as the DAO evolves.   TLDR GitcoinDAO is a community of internet citizens who builds & funds digital public goods, like Open Source Software.  So far we’ve funded $58mm of open source software, & are currently moving about $6mm/quarter to OSS de…
That’s what I was looking for, Thanks a lot for the reference. Probably I’ll try to compile those into a mindmap.
@safder is leading a charge with Sobol here
It’s @loietaylor and @Jodi_GitcoinDAO who are leading the Sobol work actually! But that’s more like an internal org chart rather than an ecosystem landscape map
i mocked up what an ecosystem map could look like on this post a while back .  though its a fairly low fidelity view.    GitcoinDAO as a generator function for coordination    1418×932 128 KB
